value.verse: In the LORD have I taken refuge; *
value.halfverse:
how then can you say to me,
 “Fly away like a bird to the hilltop;

value.verse:
For see how the wicked bend the bow
and fit their arrows to the string, *
value.halfverse: to shoot from ambush at the true of heart.

value.verse: When the foundations are being destroyed, *

value.halfverse: the LORD’S throne is in heaven.
value.verse: The LORD is in his holy temple; *

value.halfverse: his piercing eye weighs our worth.
value.verse: His eyes behold the inhabited world; *

value.halfverse: but those who delight in violence he abhors.
value.verse: The LORD weighs the righteous as well as the wicked, *
Upon the wicked he shall rain coals of fire and burning sulphur; *
value.halfverse: a scorching wind shall be their lot.

value.verse:
For the LORD is righteous;
he delights in righteous deeds; *
value.halfverse: and the just shall see his face.
